name: Tega the Explorer
description:
Oh no! While on an adventure, Tega was morbed into a dice. Help him find a way out of the Jungle.
To throw him around, click on him and drag in the direction you want to launch him. Pay attention: his feet are sticky!

(The entire game was in 8 hours, all assets included (except music and bg))

Art by https://fabiolafabs.itch.io/

Programming by https://hex08.itch.io/ and https://cialdi.itch.io/
